info.title: Pangolin Catalog API
info.description: Multi-tenant Apache Iceberg REST Catalog with advanced features including federated catalogs, credential vending, and fine-grained permissions

get.summary: List audit events with optional filtering
get.description:
Returns a list of audit events with support for powerful filtering and pagination.
All filters are optional and can be combined.

get.summary: Count audit events with optional filtering
get.description:
Returns the total count of audit events matching the specified filters.
Accepts the same query parameters as list_audit_events.

get.summary: Get a specific audit event by ID
get.description: Retrieves a single audit event by its unique identifier.

post.summary: Admin endpoint to revoke any token by ID

get.summary: List all merge operations for a catalog
List namespace tree structure for a catalog
Get sync stats for a federated catalog

post.summary: Trigger a sync for a federated catalog
Test connection to a federated catalog
Complete a merge operation (after all conflicts resolved)

get.summary: List conflicts for a merge operation
List service users for the tenant

post.summary: Rotate API key for a service user
Generate a JWT token for a tenant
post.description: This endpoint allows generating tokens for testing and development

get.summary: List tokens for a specific user (Admin only)

ApiKeyResponse.description: API Key response (only shown once on creation)

AssignRoleRequest.description: Request to assign a role to a user

count.description: Total number of audit events matching the filter

AuditListQuery.description: Query parameters for listing audit events

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

discoverable.description: Whether this asset appears in search for users without access

CreateRoleRequest.description: Request to create a new role

CreateUserRequest.description: Request to create a new user

oneOf.description: Applies to namespace and all assets within
Applies to all assets with specific tag

PermissionScope.description: Permission scope - where the permission applies

ServiceUser.description: Service user for API key authentication

password-hash.description: Password hash (bcrypt) - None for OAuth users

tenant-id.description: None for root user, Some(tenant_id) for tenant users

UserSession.description: User session for JWT or OAuth

AwsSts.description: AWS S3 with STS temporary credentials

AzureSas.description: Azure Blob Storage with SAS tokens
